acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These materials came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from Fauquier County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: The Depot House Hotel conducted business in Fauquier County during the mid-nineteenth century.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Daily register, 1866-1870, of the Depot House Hotel that records in chronological order the date customer registered, name of customer, place of customer's residence, and room number. Register is 558 pages.
